thread.title: How 1 Genius Teen Got Her Favorite Celeb to Comment on Her Instagrams
thread.title_full: How 1 Genius Teen Got Her Favorite Celeb to Comment on Her Instagrams

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: How 1 Genius Teen Got Her Favorite Celeb to Comment on Her Instagrams
text:
Kylie Melbourn is 17. She lives in Chicago. She likes to edit her photos before she posts them on the internet, she told BuzzFeed . She is every woman.
A post shared by KylieAnn (@kylie_melbourn) on Feb 5, 2017 at 11:01am PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below She uses Instagram filters for photos she wants to put on Facebook and Twitter. She sends her edited photos to Austin Mahone. She does this so she’ll have the photos to post elsewhere. She also does this because she loves him.
She’s done this “at least 40” times over the past three years. She’s sent photos to Austin of herself at prom, with her boyfriend, with her dog, and with her family. She never expected a response.
Until she got one.
When I edit my insta pics I send them to Austin mahone just so they'll save to my camera roll..after 3 years of this..he responded pic.twitter.com/920Lvgo0zM
— Kylie Ann (@kymelbourn) February 3, 2017 She has gone viral. They have fallen in love. Their home is filled with embroidered pillows reading “Looking good Kylie. Thanks for sharing your favorite memories with me.”
Kidding ‘bout those last parts.
Follow Tess on Twitter .
